summary: Email chain between Bureau of Prisons officials and the USAO SDNY Criminal Division regarding the release of investigation documents and photographs related to the July 23, 2019 incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. The Regional Counsel approves sharing the material with conditions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Inmate at Metropolitan Correctional Center, subject of an investigation into a July 23, 2019 incident.

events.title: Incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at MCC
events.description: An incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, prompting an investigation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
U.S. Department of Justice Federal Bureau of Prisons Northeast Regional Office, Second and Chestnut Streets 7th Floor, Philadelphia, PA 19106
keyFacts: The USAO SDNY Criminal Division requested documents and photographs related to the investigation of a July 23, 2019 incident involving Jeffrey Epstein.
The Bureau of Prisons Regional Counsel approved sharing the material with the condition it not be disseminated further without their knowledge and approval.
The investigation into the July 23 incident was noted as still being open at the time of the email.
The communication highlights procedural coordination between the Bureau of Prisons and federal prosecutors regarding evidence in the Epstein case.
